sys_script_include.name: GetCompanyData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_dac28f9bdbef6010bdf80181ca9619b8
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.GetCompanyData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Get the company´s country</description><name>GetCompanyData</name><script><![CDATA[var GetCompanyData = Class.create();
// Extend the global.AbstractAjaxProcessor class
GetCompanyData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    // Define the getCountry function.  
    // Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
    // Use the sysparm_companyID passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the User table.
    // Return the email address for the requested record
    getCountry: function() {
        var companyRecord = new GlideRecord("core_company");
        companyRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_companyID'));
		gs.addErrorMessage(companyRecord.country + '');
        return companyRecord.country + '';
    },
    type: 'GetEmailAddress'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-21 19:38:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>dac28f9bdbef6010bdf80181ca9619b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetCompanyData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dac28f9bdbef6010bdf80181ca9619b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-21 21:46:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
